snippet.title: Baladins - PC Release Date Trailer - Coming May 15th, 2024!
snippet.description:
Calling all adventurers: Baladins launches on PC May 15th, 2024! 🎉

Baladins is a choose-your-own-story game inspired by classic tabletop role-playing games, where you can journey solo or with up to four friends! Choose between five original heroes and travel the world as you meet a charming cast of NPCs, gather oddball items, and complete various quests in turn-based exploration to unlock the secrets of this strange land.

Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1866320/Baladins/
